page.title: 08RECREATION BEESTON RYLANDS
page.content: In the Beeston Rylands area there are plenty of clubs and things to do.Children can go to Brownies,Boys and Girls Clubs,Sunday School and Sunshine Corner. For adults there is Keep Fit,Old peoples'dancing and a Lunch Club,and a band practice. There is a club by the river,where members can have a drink and play pool. Other recreation includes playing football on the recreation grounds,and sometimes school discos. Once a year Plessey factory holds a big fair,with proper fairground rides and lots of stalls.
